CustomField.description: Provides a concatenated text of selected Milestones for deal
CustomField.formula: IF(M1__c = true,"1. Initial spend being incurred" & BR(),"") & IF(M2__c = true,"2. Asia Partners Meeting Passed" & BR(),"") & IF(M3__c = true,"3. First IC Meeting Passed" & BR(),"") & IF(M4__c = true,"4. DD Expense Approved by IC" & BR(),"") & IF(M5__c = true,"5. Exclusivity Signed" & BR(),"") & IF(M6__c = true,"6. Definitive Agreement Signed" & BR(),"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: should NOT be part of any layout
CustomField.label: completed_milestones
